rows.THE RECRUITING FUNNEL: Every person we recruit goes through a Dan Crowley-grade funnel. Built once, swapped per role.
Dan Crowley doesn't cold DM people and say 'want to join Client Ascension?'
He makes content. Content pulls people in. They opt in. They get a sequence.
By the time they talk to a human, they already believe.
We need the same thing for every role we're recruiting.
The PM co-founder, the expert, the MC, the product person, the CoS, investors.
Each one gets a funnel. Same architecture. Different content.
This is a ONE-TIME BUILD. You build the funnel infrastructure once.
Then you swap the lead magnet, the video, the email sequence per role.

rows.col_2: Target sees content about the IonWave system in THEIR domain
rows.col_3:
Short video (MC or Nilo explaining the model relevant to their role)
Social post / thread
Reddit comment in relevant subreddit

rows.col_2: Target downloads the advertorial for their domain
rows.col_3:
Swipe file / template / checklist from the Advertorial Engine
Gated behind email opt-in
rows.col_4:
Kit (ConvertKit) landing page
Simple, Fernando Oliver style

rows.col_2: 5-7 emails over 10-14 days showing what this is and why it matters
rows.col_3:
Email 1: The resource + "here's what we're building"
Email 2: MC conversation clip (the system in action)
Email 3: The career booster angle (what you get)
Email 4: Behind the scenes (the Trade, the clusters, the cast)
Email 5: Social proof (who else is involved, Nilo's background)
Email 6: The ask ("we're looking for [role]")
Email 7: Application link + FAQ

rows.col_2: Target fills out a role-specific application form
rows.col_3:
Short form: name, background, relevant experience, why interested, portfolio/LinkedIn
Not a job application. A "tell us about yourself" form.

rows.col_2: MC has a recorded conversation with the applicant. Gets to know them. Explains the project in detail. Answers questions.
rows.col_3:
This is NOT an interview. It's a conversation.
MC asks: "What are you working on? What excites you? What would you build if you could?"
The conversation is content too — posted on the site as cast page material.
rows.col_4:
Zoom/Riverside recording
MC has a conversation guide (not a script)

rows.col_2: PM co-founder reviews application + MC conversation. Recommends to Nilo. Nilo approves.
rows.col_3:
PM writes a 1-paragraph recommendation.
Nilo reviews and approves/rejects.

rows.col_2: New team member gets site access, cluster assignment, contract, first MC conversation about their scope.
rows.col_3:
Welcome email with site password
Cluster orientation doc
Contract (C- tab)
First MC recorded conversation: "Welcome to the cast"

rows.col_2: Business model template or cluster-specific framework
rows.col_3: "Be a co-founder. Own a cluster. Build something real."
rows.col_4: "What's your PM experience? What excites you about this scope?"

rows.col_3: "Your name on a verified, funded model. 10-20 hrs. Published credit."
rows.col_4: "Walk me through how you'd evaluate this. What does good look like?"

rows.col_2: N/A (content IS the magnet — they see the existing videos and want in)
rows.col_3: "Host 200+ hours of content. Be the face of a DAO launch."
rows.col_4: "Tell me about yourself. (MC audition IS the conversation)"

rows.col_2: Site design template or component library
rows.col_3: "Build the best portfolio piece of your career. Equity + credit."
rows.col_4: "Show me your favorite project. What would you do differently here?"

rows.col_3: "Venture studio ops experience. YC-backed founder reference."
rows.col_4: "How do you stay organized? Walk me through your workflow."

rows.col_2: D2C launch playbook or operator scorecard
rows.col_3: "Run a funded D2C brand. Full operator equity."
rows.col_4: "What would you do in the first 30 days? How would you prioritize?"

rows.col_2: Trade thesis summary or market analysis
rows.col_3: "Watch a company being built in real time. The most transparent launch ever."

rows.THE RECRUITING FUNNEL: • 7 email templates: Claude writes, PM reviews (2-3 hrs)
• 1 landing page template: replicate per lead magnet (1-2 hrs to design once)
• Lead magnet production: Claude extracts from Trade, PM packages (1-2 hrs per magnet)
Then each new role just swaps the content into the existing infrastructure.
